column4: i installed ubuntu 11.04 in my win7 laptop on a seperate partition from an installation cd , now not able to view ubuntu while booting and booting straight to windows. could anyone help me?
i installed ubuntu 11.04 in my win7 laptop on a seperate partition from an installation cd , now not able to view ubuntu while booting and booting straight to windows. could anyone help me?
try to hold shift key on bootup to get to the menu
don't know where grub the bootmanager is installed, you may look for a bios bootmenu, e.g. some are on F8
